author: Simon Difford
description: A riff on a Godfather that's spirituous and delicately sweet almond with faint cherry fruit followed by a surprisingly dry finish.
name: Fruity Godchild
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
